alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 11:20PM MDT until June 24 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR DEUEL...EASTERN HAMLIN AND SOUTHEASTERN CODINGTON COUNTIES... At 1219 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Albee to Moritz to 6 miles southeast of Estelline, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Gary and Lake Cochrane Rec Area around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Astoria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
